info.name: XYZ-Integrations
info.description: Entails APIs hosted by the microservices integration. For complete information, lookout [https://github.com/david-matu/xyz_integration_demo](https://github.com/david-matu/xyz_integration_demo)

item.name: Validate the enrolment status of a Student

request.description:
Returns the enrolment status of a given student. 

This resource expects __student_id__ and __account_number__ to validate the student

response.name: OK
Bad Request, invalid format of the request. See response message for more information
Not found. The specified id does not exist
Unprocessable Entity

item.name: Get a Student record by passing ID

request.description:
# Normal response
200 - OK - When a Student is returned, it indicates payment can be made for them since they are active

200 - OK - but empty object
This is the case when the StudentID does not reflect a particular Student record, or the Student is no longer marked _ACTIVE_ in the institution

response.name: OK
Bad Request, invalid format of the request. See response message for more information
Not found. The specified id does not exist
Unprocessable Entity
